title: Drawing, "Plate Design:  Les Oranges [Oranges],  from Service des Objets de Dessert [Service on the Theme of Desserts]", 1819–20
title_raw: Plate Design:  Les Oranges [Oranges],  from Service des Objets de Dessert [Service on the Theme of Desserts]
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper left center:  confiseur [confectioner]; upper right:  Les oranges; verso:  in graphite and pen and brown ink, left of center:  1er cahier [portfolio]/1. poires [pears]/2. pommes[apples] /3. raisins [grapes]/4. cerises[cherries]/5. groseille [red current/6. noix[walnuts]/7. noisette[hazelnut]/8. pèche abricot [peach apricot]/9. sucre[suger]/10. vin du armagnac[armagnac]; center:  1. fraises[stawberries]/2. macarons[macaroons]/3. [unreadable]/4. les petits gateaux[little cakes]/5. les flans poire[pear flans]/6. les annans [sic] [pineapple]; right of center:  1. [unreadable]/2. annanas [sic] [pineapple]/3. oranges/4. marons[sic] [horse chestnuts]/5. pruneaux [plums]/6. compotes marmelades[jam compotes]/7. crèmes[custards]/8. fromages salés[salted cheeses]/9. confiseur en pot[?]/10. les flans[custards]; lower right [paper turned vertically]:  1. les [unreadable]/2. les macarons[macaroons]/3. les biscuits[cookies]/4. les petit gateaux[little cakes]/5/ les drapée/6. le punch[punch]/7. les liquers vin[liquers]/8. les [unreadable]/9. le café[coffee]/10. les sorbets[sorbets]
provenance:
Collection H.N.
Spencer Samuels, New York
description: Sketch of a confectioners shop.  Woman, center right, appears to be holding a basket of candy.  A figure to her left gazes at the candy.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Plate Design:  Les Oranges [Oranges],  from Service des Objets de Dessert [Service on the Theme of Desserts]", 1819–20. Graphite on cream laid paper. 1989-13-16.
